website_summaries.verdict: Minor concerns aside, this sauté pan's nice workmanship, large cooking capacity, and exceptional warranty surpasses most competitors when it comes to features cooks love.
pros: Earns praise for its spacious 7-quart capacity and hard anodized cook surface that resists sticking and heats evenly
Safe for use in the oven up to 450°F
Backed by the company's full lifetime warranty
cons: Rare reports of the bottom of the pan warping, but the warranty provides peace of mind
Some owners wish it had a traditional handle instead of loop handles

customer_reviews.title: Alternative to a Deep Pot
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pan for my husband for Christmas 2017. It is a large pan which replaces the use of a deep pot for many dishes. We LOVE it! Heavy weight, nice handles, flat bottom and the coating is superb. This is important to me because he cooks, I clean! Highly recommend this pan to others. I am not a paid reviewer. I purchase merchandise from Amazon on a weekly basis. I wait until I have used the product to form an honest opinion of it before posting a review. I will answer questions unless I feel the seller should respond.
customer_reviews.author: LuvsCheese

customer_reviews.title: Great pan but it arrived empty so after waiting 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great pan but it arrived empty so after waiting 3 days to receive it, I still had to make a separate trip to the grocery store before I could cook a meal.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sedek

customer_reviews.title: You'll love the extra room
customer_reviews.text: I had a 5 qt sauteuse pan for years and loved it. But the long handle made it difficult to store, and after years of use, the non-stick coating was wearing off. At first I was afraid this 7 qt size might be too big, but it's great. The short handles make storage so much easier, and there's plenty of room to saute and stir a batch of onions, carrots, mushrooms, and peppers without tossing them out the pan. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: WBC

customer_reviews.title: Received old lid; water collects in it; no response x2mo from Calphalon customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have no issues or complaints with the pan; however, I received the older style lid, and a substantial amount of water collects in it. Calphalon has not responded to my inquiry beyond an automated email that they have received it. I can't recommend any Calphalon product with the older style glass lid. I will drill holes in my lid to clear the water (I see that other reviewers have done this successfully). Update: received email from customer service after two months; they offered to replace with an identical lid. Would avoid this brand unless receiving a new lid is guaranteed (purchase in store?).
customer_reviews.author: Renard Dubois

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight, Great Capacity, Easy to Handle
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous pot with an excellent capacity for making soups, stews, or anything else where you want to make quite a bit without fear of your ingredients spilling over the sides. The most wonderful thing about it is that is it extremely light and I can actually pick it up with one hand and scrape it out with the other. A great pot for so many uses, excellent surface that doesn't scratch! I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Star

customer_reviews.title: Eliminated 3 pieces because this one does the job of all of them...
customer_reviews.text: I love this sauteuse! It is so huge. I can make a really big dish in it and not have to worry about the handle being to where any of the little kids can reach it. It is so much easier to store without a long handle. We have a big family with lots of boys so I make big meals. Non-stick is perfect. I've had it about 2 months and I'm wondering why I didn't get it a couple years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for frying
customer_reviews.text: This is our primary pan when cooking. Frying, sautéing, really anything that doesn't need a pot of boiling liquid. Has held up great - just 1 scratch in the finish. Easy to clean. It is very large. Not all stove tops have a burner this big.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warped!!!
customer_reviews.text: Warped and wobbles on stove top. So far only stove top use. I own a Calphalon set in a different line and its fine so I have to say its this line and type of pan. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick was not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Within the year, the non-stick coating began to have problems. It was only used for light-weight home use, and no heavy levels of heat. At this point it is being thrown away as the item will not come clean. I had saved the previous model from 2002 whose non-stick surface is actually in much better shape than this one and resumed use. Only problem with it was the lid cracked. They changed shape of the lid and the old one will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Mot

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite cookwares
customer_reviews.text: I have been waiting to purchase this cookware for a while and when price dropped I did myself a favor and got it. Really happy about this deep-sauteuse-pan. It is big enough to cook larger amount of anything, super easy to clean and nonstick surface enable use of smaller amount of oil. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warped
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. It warped within first 6 months of ownership. For this price point it should be good for life. Will be making a warranty claim. And no I didn't put in cold water while it was hot.
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Just the size I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I have quite a few recipes that require a large pan and this functions well for those. You do have to be careful what utensils you use, how you clean / scrub. It will scratch easily. The people that complained about water / moisture getting in around the edge of the lid are correct so did mine the first time I washed it even before I used it. Really Calphalon step up your game, I own several pans with similar glass lids none of which have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pan!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This the best piece of cookware ever! Heats evenly, nothing sticks to the inside and it's easy to clean. We were able to put a half package of bacon slices in at once and they came out evenly cooked and crispy. It is definitely worth the price. Looking forward to using this pan for everything.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Bottom warped after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of use on a ceramic stovetop it has developed a high spot in the middle of the bottom. It no longer stays in full contact with the ceramic stovetop and will not heat evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait a few months before writing my review. I LOVE this thing. The extra room makes a big difference. We've had zero issues with this thing. I use it at least 2-3 times a week. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: Not the original
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a replacement for my 15+ year hard anodized Calphalon saute pan. I thought this was it. Everything is now "non-stick" which I did not want. Moreover, the pan itself seems to be less than half the thickness of my original. My wife loves it and considering she does not often cook, I am inclined to think it has some redeeming qualities I am overlooking.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn R. Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for large batches of sauces or any type of meals for the whole family. Easy clean up which is a big plus
customer_reviews.author: C.A.

customer_reviews.title: Non splattering large sized pan.
customer_reviews.text: It's deep and I can fry and make pancakes. I am so loving this pan. It is huge so there will be no splattering on anything! Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mississippi1

customer_reviews.title: Heats well and cleans up easily.
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan. It heats well and is easy to clean. I have used it on gas and glass top electric.
customer_reviews.author: Moo

customer_reviews.title: Great Pan for Big Batches
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I need to make big dishes - like chicken and dumplings for 6-8 people. This pan is perfect, and I can put it in the oven for the final few minutes once the dumplings are added.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry W. Mccoy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pan.
customer_reviews.text: This pan is perfect. Large enough for any dish and it's oven safe. Love the fact it does not have a long handle. So easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gyurnek

customer_reviews.title: Great pan!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan! It is a great size, and easier to use on my stove than a large fry pan with a handle. I have used this pan now several times. It cleans up quickly. While not lightweight, it is lighter than I anticipated. Lid is also not heavy, and cleans up nicely. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Dubow-Young

customer_reviews.title: Not made well
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed it is warped. Was not out in to any water until completely cooled and stored with the lid and nothing on top. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Elmer Redinger

customer_reviews.title: Love Calphalon and love this pot
customer_reviews.text: Love Calphalon and love this pot. It is HUGE but I have four kids, so it works well for us. I am going to look for it in a little smaller version. Doesn't stick and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Ausloos

customer_reviews.title: I love this pan
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan. It works perfectly, very non-stick, fits easily in my oven, and the price was great! Highly recommend :).
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Fox

customer_reviews.title: This pan is so versatile, and it's dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.text: This deep pan can do so much, and on top of which it's dishwasher safe. Also, almost nothing sticks to it, which makes cleaning so effortless.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Roy

customer_reviews.title: Lid Retains Water
customer_reviews.text: I love cooking with this pan. Problem is there is a space where glass and metal come to together to form the edge of the lid. It retains water after washing. A day later you pick it u and nasty cleaning water comes out. I may return it.
customer_reviews.author: SteveE

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: After only 2 uses this pan began to bulb out from the center and would no longer sit flat on the stove top making it impossible to heat the pan evenly and properly cook.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Tidd

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Refuse to cook in anything else! Veggies and Eggs is mostly all I eat. This thing is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Bottom rounded out
customer_reviews.text: After two weeks of using, the bottom started to round out making only 4-7 inches of the pan touch the actual burner. So disappointing for the price!!! I do love the size, but it’s useless if the heat is uneven.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Berube

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty pan
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite pans. I can use it on the stove top and in the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Love the size-I was able to cook quite a bit in this pan. The only thing that I found a little off was that the cover didn't fit snuggly-it could be because I washed it in the dishwasher and it may have affected it.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite Vizzini

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We really love this. It is large, well made, and cooks nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Gern B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but really big.
customer_reviews.text: Read the dimensions before purchasing. This pan is huge! I ended up returning and getting the 5 qt which is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cooking area
customer_reviews.text: Excellent heat coverage and easy clean up. Best of all no need to over heat this item. And it has a massive cooking area perfect for large veggie and casserole sauté options!
customer_reviews.author: Don Utterback

customer_reviews.title: I love this pan!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think I needed a pan of this size but it is my most favorite pan now.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect extra large pan
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize how big it was... but I absolutely love it. Works excellent, and makes cooking so much easier and fun. Love the fact it has the lid
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and she absolutely loves it! It was a great value and she thoroughly enjoys using it as well as I do too!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Good pan for the money...
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is a pretty good pan. Don't do what I did though and try and braise with it.. Mine went slightly out of flat after braising some chicken tenders. This surprised me because I had used it several times before with no ill effects. Possibly through my own error I let it get too hot. I had also used it in the oven the previous evening, but only at 350. Just a warning that it can happen. Still, but most normal applications you should be okay. Lid sits very well and the non-stick seems very durable. Recommend. BTW... it is not 4 pounds... 6.5 is more like it.
customer_reviews.author: Faja4x

customer_reviews.title: It is just the right size and cooks great! Cleans easily too
customer_reviews.text: This pot/pan is everything I wanted. It is just the right size and cooks great! Cleans easily too.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great pan. Can accommodate large recipe which is what ...
customer_reviews.text: Great pan. Can accommodate large recipe which is what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th time I have bought this pan. Given as a gift twice, second one for me!
customer_reviews.author: William F.  Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pan
customer_reviews.text: Great frying pan. Plenty of room and works like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl J Macres

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Pan
customer_reviews.text: We decided to replace a large covered skillet with something nicer. Calphalon is a brand we like and trust, so this pan was the natural choice. We love the size and depth, which increases the utility of the pan. From stovetop to oven...it's simply great.
customer_reviews.author: BGC

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't ever purchased this brand before. It's easy to use and most of all, easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: cfw

customer_reviews.title: lOVE THIS POT.
customer_reviews.text: WISH I WOULD HAVE BOUGHT THIS YEARS AGO!!!! LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS POT!!!
customer_reviews.author: arline schwechter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to  lift with 2 side handles.
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan. Easy to lift with the two side handles. Nice size.
customer_reviews.author: Liisa C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the occasional larger meal.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the occasional larger meal. Avoid using metal on the pan, but that should be pretty obvious.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Koppelmann

customer_reviews.title: Amazon dropped the ball
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for someone . Came shipped in it’s original box dirty and marked. Pan is great, own one myself
customer_reviews.author: Carl Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Mom of many
customer_reviews.text: Love the wide bottom. Cook for a big family. Use it all of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lazaro

customer_reviews.title: Pan warped
customer_reviews.text: Bottom of pan warped after using it one time. Returning to Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Robert Freeland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This pan seems well constructed and sturdy. The size is perfect for pasta dishes and casseroles.
customer_reviews.author: Erica S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for this large family of 7!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this pan for about 3 weeks now and I love it! We are a family of 7, so I needed something very big and this works great. It easily fits a whole one-pot-meal, plus leftovers for us. Great for spaghetti sauce and stirfrys.
customer_reviews.author: Marc D Hunter

customer_reviews.title: This pan is everything I hoped it would be. ...
customer_reviews.text: This pan is everything I hoped it would be. It cooks evenly and makes cooking one pan dishes a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Hall

customer_reviews.title: The giver of life
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife... she hasn't stopped cooking since. So it's the gift that keeps on giving.
customer_reviews.author: Omar OG   IG: @international_og

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Large enough for anything a home kitchen might have to throw at it. Plus that Calaphon quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Good, heavyweight pan. Cleans so easily that I don't need to put it in the dishwasher, but I could!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect upgrade for our old pan
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had any issues with this pan since we bought it. It's been about a month and it's holding up well. While it does say "dishwasher safe", and I could probably put it into the dishwasher if I tried, it's a bit big to fit along with our other dishes. The nonstick surface has been a breeze to clean in the sink, though, and no complaints at all with the size or quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: I use this pan for almost everything. It is ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this pan for almost everything. It is huge! I can cook half a week's meals all at once (lots of leftovers). My only complaint is that it's so big it hangs way over the burner and other pots and pans in other burners get bumped. But I knew how big it was going to be when I bought it, so it's probably not fair to complain.
customer_reviews.author: C K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Large pan terrific for cooking without mess. Heats evenly. I've used it several times and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol  Jean Elnicky

customer_reviews.title: I love the large size
customer_reviews.text: I love the large size, nonstick coating and super feature of using it for browning meat and being able to finish the dish in the oven. Love it
customer_reviews.author: LOIS PORATH

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very good non stick pan. The size is absolutely fantastic. Very atractive finish can serve directly to table. Very recomended
customer_reviews.author: Rubi

customer_reviews.title: We use it at least once a week!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for making huge meals that you can freeze, if necessary. It was one of the best purchase decision for cookware I've made.
customer_reviews.author: Chiaroscuro88

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love Calphalon.....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son, an aspiring cook-in-training, for Christmas. He has already used it a couple of times and says he loves it. Great size and easy to clean. The right tools in the kitchen make all the difference. When you buy Calphalon you can be sure it will be the right tool..
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Punch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price for what is now my favorite piece of cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Brack

customer_reviews.title: Is it wrong to be in love with a pot
customer_reviews.text: Is it wrong to be in love with a pot? Because I LOVE this pot. I love the size and the capacity of food that can be cooked at one time, the fast and even browning, and easy clean up. I have used it practically everyday since I received it. It's definitely worth the money and I certainly would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Racheal Marie

customer_reviews.title: This is a great pan! We tried switching from non-stick to stainless
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pan! We tried switching from non-stick to stainless, but the non-stick really works well for many of my dishes. And it's large enough to cook a lot in the one pan. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Harnick Sudbury

customer_reviews.title: lid doesn't fit properly
customer_reviews.text: Just received and have only used 6 times, so I can't rate about long-term or oven use, but so far, this is what I think. Pros: I like the depth for larger foods. I like smaller handles on both sides. I like the cleanup---hand washed easily . I like the even cooking. Cons: Lid doesn't fit properly---too large for rim of pan so I had to be careful of escaping steam. Handles aren't heat-resistant. I'm sure there are other brands which would contain all the features I like without the things I don't , so I would not recommend this product or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MEJ

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - Defective - Lid retains water
customer_reviews.text: Update: after ordering another one, I encountered the same issue where the lid retains water (water is trapped inside the lid) Really wanted this to work as the size is perfect for me. Returning after one use. After first use already started warping a bit at the bottom, and when cleaning it water penetrated between the glass closet of the cover and the metal rim ( see pic). I am reordering is the hopes that it is a one off defect.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Kamienchick

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's HUUUUUGE. Needed a new large saute pan after our last (TWO!) warped on the bottom (even the heavy duty all-clad tri-ply). This thing is ginormous, but perfect for cooking a large meal. I like that it has two small handles on the sides instead of a large handle on one side, it makes it MUCH easier to dump out contents into a serving bowl.
customer_reviews.author: R.W.

customer_reviews.title: The Lid Holds Water that Can't Be Removed in a Channel Around the Perimeter.
customer_reviews.text: Upon delivery of the pan, I washed both the pan and lid. The lid is the problem. The lid has a metal ring around the perimeter of the glass that has a hollow channel engineered into the design. The hollow channel goes around the entire perimeter. While washing, water gets into this channel and the water can't be dried or drained, and the channel can't be cleaned. I think that this could be a possible health concern as bacteria could be present in that area, and when the pan with the lid is heated, expansion or contraction could cause the fluid in the channel to drip into the food.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Art

customer_reviews.title: Great Pot but wish it was a little heavier metal
customer_reviews.text: I love this pot of the size and versatility because of the depth and size. However, I wish the metal was a bit heavier so that it acts somewhat like a cast iron pan would for some things that you need this type of pot. That would make it perfect. The surface does wear. However, I still love it for so many dishes.
customer_reviews.author: R. Peck

customer_reviews.title: If you don't own one, GET ONE! :)
customer_reviews.text: This is a pan everyone MUST have. It is my go-to pan for all dishes from sauces to sauté. The high sides make browning mess-free and large capacity allows for pasta dishes to be tossed in one pan. Love this pan!
customer_reviews.author: Writenow

customer_reviews.title: It has a lid....yay!!
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled to finally find a larger pot, that avtually comes with a lid that fits it properly. I love how evenly the heat is distributed throughout making cooking easy and the dish you are making turns out lovely. Very easy to clean and take care of. However the only issue is that when you wash the lid....water gets in the rim, and takes time to dry out, because there is no way of removing the edge to dry it. Overall fabulous item and I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice sized pan
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice sized pan. It's larger than many pans and can therefore cook more at once. The non-stick coating is useful as is the included lid. The handles permit easy transfer to the oven and allow for pans on adjacent burners. It also looks very nice. Note, it is not heavy gauge, but that doesn't seem to affect performance. We are using it a lot, as expected.
customer_reviews.author: CriticalEye

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The base has warped after only several months of light use on an electric stove. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shade

customer_reviews.title: This a huge pan
customer_reviews.text: This is a massive pan, so make sure it is what you need. We are constantly cooking large dinners for family and friends, so this is exactly way we needed. Our burners are gas and raised, so it worked with our large stove. However, on smaller electric stoves with ceramic flat tops it may be too big.
customer_reviews.author: fanofhistory

customer_reviews.title: Really good cookware
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my extra large (Costco purchased) sauté pan, which is not longer sold there. It's not quite as big as my favorite Costco pan, but it's a good size and really good quality. It is an easier fit into the cupboard with both handles being 'helper' size, rather than one long handle. Truly a non-stick, cleanup is a cinch!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect
customer_reviews.text: By far one of the best pan fryer purchases I've made in a long time. Absolutely love this pan. Heats evenly and is perfect for just about anything. I have fried 3 pounds of bacon in this thing all at once without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Brbaybee

customer_reviews.title: ... an older calphalon pan of similar proportions that I loved. It was well seasoned
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace an older calphalon pan of similar proportions that I loved. It was well seasoned, but warped badly. This pan has more of a non-stick finish which I do not prefer due to long term resilience, but the pan is wonderful to use and super easy to clean. I cook almost everything I make in it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen In NC

customer_reviews.title: My kids loved their gifts
customer_reviews.text: I got a couple of these for my grown kids for Christmas. Just recently they both told me they love theirs.
customer_reviews.author: Noreen L. Bechard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for making an extra large batch of Jambalaya
customer_reviews.text: Large 'Paella' type cooker. I'm a Cajun cook and will use this to make large amounts of Jambalaya. This is larger than my 5 quart pan which is just undersized to make two full batches of my jambalaya but this is just big enough to accommodate it all.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny L Nipp

customer_reviews.title: non stick and perfect for stove top cooking a pot roast
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching high and low for a skillet that's at least 13" wide and can be used in the oven if needed. This skillet is about 15" wide, non stick and perfect for stove top cooking a pot roast. Or for baking in the oven. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Hall

customer_reviews.title: Most used item in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I cook everything in this thing. It's great for searing meat prior to finishing in the oven, sauteing large amounts of spinach, large batches of soups and sauces, one pot meals, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: very very hot handles
customer_reviews.text: the 2 handles get extremely hot when using and is far as I.m concerned it is a safety hazard so buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: RAYMOND BERARDI

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity makes for large meals with leftovers.
customer_reviews.text: Great pan to start cooking on the stove then into the oven or either on or into. Great size for large meals. Cooks evenly. Be careful not to use metal utensils.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Caramalizes onions quickly on low
customer_reviews.text: Big pot. I love it. Caramalizes onions quickly on low. The top makes a popping noise when cooking that is hard to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Temple Naff

customer_reviews.title: Would be 5 stars, but the damn pan warps ...
customer_reviews.text: Would be 5 stars, but the damn pan warps more than the USS Enterprise when heated. It technically does what it's supposed to, but just.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great pan that really is non-stick
customer_reviews.text: Great, solid, non-stick surface that actually is non-stick. Nice and heavy so it won't warp. Lid fits tight.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Good buy with top.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a larger non stick pan for stew. This did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: John A Scarf

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Love it just like other Calphalon products. Great price, much cheaper than in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Size Pan
customer_reviews.text: We needed a pan in between a large pot and saute pan and this one works perfectly. The only downside is the handles get hot.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size pan for my wife
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size pan for my wife. She wanted a larger pan for cooking and this one fits the bill most excellent.

product_meta.title: Calphalon Contemporary Hard-Anodized Aluminum Nonstick Cookware, Sauteuse Pan, 7-quart, Black -
product_meta.description: Featuring a hard-anodized exterior and nonstick interior. Calphalon Contemporary Nonstick sauteuse pan combines durability and performance with fast clean-up and easy low-fat cooking. Heavy-gauge aluminum construction ensures even heating and is hard-anodized for durability. It also makes the saute pan dishwasher-safe. Interior includes three layers of nonstick coating – two layers provide durability and the third layer offers easy release performance. Two loop handles for easy handling. Pans and covers are also oven safe, making it ideal for finishing a gourmet dish. Beautifully-shaped pan is great for simmering sauces, or making paella, oven casseroles and even frittata. The nonstick surface means you can cook healthier using less fat, with effortless cleanup. Comes with Calphalon's full lifetime warranty.
feature_bullets: Heavy gauge aluminum construction ensures even heating and is hard-anodized for durability. It also makes it dishwasher safe
Interior includes three layers of nonstick coating, two layers provide durability and the third layer offers easy release performance
Saute use pan has two loop handles for easy handling. Pans and covers are also oven safe, making it ideal for finishing a gourmet dish
Beautifully shaped saute pan is great for simmering sauces, or making paella, oven casseroles and even frittata
The nonstick surface means you can cook healthier using less fat, with effortless cleanup. Comes with Calphalon's full lifetime warranty
